about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a studio specialized in creating web solutions that drive businesses and transform ideas into digital reality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Help companies and entrepreneurs establish a solid digital presence through high-quality web development, focused on performance, scalability, and exceptional user experience.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the reference studio for those seeking professional, modern, and scalable web solutions. We want every project from Orbit to become a digital asset that generates real value.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from people who trusted Orbit to take their digital presence to the next level.

luisSergio.name: Luis Sergio
luisSergio.quote: The Orbit team created a professional and optimized landing page that completely elevated our company's image. Now our clients better understand our services and quote faster.

mariaJose.name: Maria Jose
mariaJose.quote: The online store turned out amazing. Everything looks modern, fast and very clear for our customers. Thanks to Orbit we were able to launch our product professionally from day one.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We resolve the most common doubts about how we work at Orbit and our web development and AWS services.

whatIncludes.question: What does website development include?
whatIncludes.answer: It includes custom design, responsive development, performance optimization, essential SEO, API integration, deployment on AWS or Vercel, and technical consulting during the process.

timeline.question: How long does a project take to complete?
timeline.answer: The time depends on the project scope. A landing page can take 1–2 weeks and a more complete system can take between 4–8 weeks. A clear timeline is always delivered at the start.

technologies.question: Do you use modern and optimized technologies?
technologies.answer: Yes. We work with React, Vite, Material UI, Node.js, AWS, CI/CD and the best performance and security practices.

support.question: Do you offer maintenance or support after development?
support.answer: Yes. We can offer monthly maintenance, content updates, monitoring, continuous optimization, or event-based support depending on the project.

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer: Normally it's split 50% at the start and 50% at completion. For large projects it's distributed in milestones.

aws.question: Can you work with AWS or scalable infrastructure?
aws.answer: Yes. We are AWS specialists, including S3, CloudFront, Lambda, API Gateway, SES, Cognito, EC2, RDS and serverless architecture or containers with Docker.

access.question: Will I have access to my accounts (AWS, Vercel, domains, emails)?
access.answer: Yes. All accounts belong to the client. We configure the infrastructure, deliver access and don't retain anything.

migration.question: Can I migrate my current site to better technology or AWS?
migration.answer: Yes. We can take your current site, optimize it, redesign it or migrate it to a more modern, fast and secure infrastructure.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Orbit, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services or communicate with us.

dataCollected.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollected.description: We may collect the following types of personal information when you interact with our website or services:
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, pages visited)

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.description: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
items: Respond to your inquiries and information requests
Improve our services and user experience
Send communications related to your project
Comply with legal and tax obligations

retention.title: 3. Data Retention
retention.description: We will retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described or as required by law. Once the purpose is fulfilled, we will proceed with the secure deletion of your information.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.description: As a data subject, you have the right to:
items: Access your personal data that we have on record
Delete your data from our records
Object to the processing of your data for specific purposes
Revoke your consent at any time

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, you can contact us through the contact form on our website or by sending an email to the address indicated on the contact page.
